Text.Page:
Thanks to your help we were able to fix the wheel and deliver the promised goods in time.

You really can be counted on. I have one last thing to ask of you.

I am begging you.
My good name is on the line.

I'd be eternally grateful if you could take care of it for me."What is it?"

This box contains a part made by a ingenious engineer.

It is beyond comparison with any other goods.

Please bring this box to Tamari.
After entering the sky cruiser you meet the cute Popori Paesyn, and Mari tells you everything about the expedition to the Lost Continent.

Tonas came through? I wondered if he'd swindled me.

Very well. I know who you are. You're cleared to ascend to the dock.

Oh, I'm so clumsy!

Well, hello!
My nose is never wrong. You smell like a nice person, so I like you. Do you like me?

Hey, can I ask you a favor? This wind tore some really important secret papers from my bag. I have to get them back!

Will you help me?

My hero! It would have been a disaster if those pages had been found by the enemy...or her.

, are you boarding the sky cruiser, too?"Indeed."

That's great! You're great. We'll adventure together!

You should report to Rafe! See you in the sky!
Where are the rest of the pages?

You're the last soldier on the list. Good!

Please deliver the manifest to Maribel. Oh, and thanks to you the supplies will be loaded soon.
Excellent work. Good luck on your mission.
